name: USA Bowhunting Simulator: FPS Animals Hunting Game

description:
Bowhunting in the USA - Hunting games. Realistic FPS hunting simulator. Let’s hunt! From the creators of Girls Archery Champion: Bow Sport 3D! Hunting wild animals (deer hunter, wolf hunter etc). Best of all archery & hunting games! Return to wilderness and prepare for the ultimate animals hunting challenge with ‘USA Bowhunting Simulator: FPS Animals Hunting Game’. World’s greatest hunting experience while getting new trophies, taking down wolves, bears and cheetahs. Shoot like a pro, develop a steady hand and master your archery skills to take the perfect shot. The best shooting game on the store! Hunt or be hunted! Hunt around the world in other ‘bow & arrow’ games! A crossbow, bow or a sniper gun (pixel gun) - use any weapon you want! Let’s hunt the wildest American animals using bow and crossbow! Bowman adventure the american way! Hide and wait for the animals to come. Stunning 3D graphics gives you realistic bowhunting experience! Deer hunter the american way! Become an Archery Master 3D! Archery World Champion in hunting and hitting the bull’s eye! No silly tiny archers game! Serious hunting in wilderness. Fun game for free! Wild hunter in American grounds! Let’s hunt!

USA Bowhunting Simulator: FPS Animals Hunting Game gives you:
Beautiful American environment in 3D
Oregon coast
Yellowstone Park
Colorado
California
Nevada

Stunning 3D graphics
Ultimate hunting experience
Real life animals
